content: swirl baby blanket a simpleknits design supplies needed 3 skeins bernat baby jacquards a dk/sport weight yarn 3 5 oz/346 yards 1 038 yards crochet hook size g 4 mm or h 5 mm finished size 40 across pattern notes i don t make a ring to start i use the stitch farthest away from the hook as the ring for a tighter center use chain 3 to start every round if it works better for you for a more invisible join insert your crochet hook from the underside of the chain and slip_stitch to join the round round 1 chain 3 work 11 double_crochet in the chain farthest from the hook join with a slip st to the top of the chain 3 round 2 chain 2 work 2 double_crochet in next st chain 1 * double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next ch1 * around join to top of chain 2 round 3 chain 2 double_crochet in next st 3 double_crochet in next ch1 * double_crochet double_crochet 3 double_crochet ch1 * around join to top of chain 2 round 4 chain 2 * double_crochet in each st until 1 st before chain 1 space work 3 double_crochet in last double_crochet chain 1 * around join to top of chain 2 repeat round 4 until the blanket is the size your desire pull end through last stitch and secure all ends the green/yellow/cream version was made with 880 yards of red heart designer sport yarn using 4 colors wave edging single_crochet *half_double_crochet 2 dcs 3 treble in one st 2 dcs half_double_crochet single_crochet * repeat from * to * around the edge of the blanket © november 2008 vicki mikulak all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only questions simple knits@yahoo com
